info.description: With the LiquidAccount API you can access your Liquid Account data realtime, but you can also maintain several resources.
info.title: IQNOMY LiquidAccount API

get.summary: Returns list of all Liquid Accounts

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: If `true` only active containers, if `false` only inactive containers, otherwise all containers are returned

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: If `true` only active dimensions, if `false` only inactive dimensions, otherwise all dimensions are returned

parameters.name: dimensionDefinitionId
parameters.description: only dimensions with filled in dimension definition id are returned

delete.description: Always apply one of the filters. Only then the found dimensions will be deleted.

parameters.name: dimensionDefinitionId
parameters.description: only dimensions with filled in dimension definition id are returned

delete.description: Dimension can be found via it's id or it's definition id.

parameters.name: dimensionId
parameters.description: id of the dimension or a dimension definition

get.summary: Returns dimension metrics by day (of month)
Returns list of events (with a maximum of 100 events)

parameters.name: timestampStart
parameters.description: Start of event time range (epoch time). Can be combined with timestampEnd parameter

parameters.name: timestampEnd
parameters.description: End of event time range (epoch time)

parameters.name: includeProfile
parameters.description: If `true`, include user's profile in each event

parameters.name: includeSession
parameters.description: If `true`, include user's session in each event

parameters.name: includeResource
parameters.description: If `true`, include resource in each event

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: includeResource
parameters.description: If `true`, include resource in each event

get.summary: Returns a list of event properties

parameters.name: profileId
parameters.description: id (internal id also possible) of the profile

parameters.name: includeSessions
parameters.description: if true the 50 most recent sessions will be included

get.summary: Returns event metrics by day (of month)
Returns event metrics by week (of year)
Returns of all plugins metrics by day (of month)
Returns plugin metrics by day (of month)
Returns of all plugins metrics by month
Returns of all plugins metrics by week (of year)
Returns plugin metrics by week (of year)
Returns of all plugins metrics by year
Returns session metrics by day (of month)
Returns session metrics by week (of year)
Returns of all websites metrics by day (of month)
Returns website metrics by day (of month)
Returns of all websites metrics by month
Returns of all websites metrics by week (of year)
Returns website metrics by week (of year)
Returns of all websites metrics by year

eventType.description: event type (0 = page visit, 1 = IQuery, 2 = click, 3 = form submit, 4 = webshop)

allOf.description: A custom events is a event which can be triggered in customized situations.

count.description: number of plugin calls during this period (might be filtered)

DimensionPropertyCreateInput.description: Dimension property which will be added to a dimension

allOf.description: Represent an event trigger by a webshop.

requestCount.description: number of website requests during period

eventTypeMetrics.description: number of website requests during period

allOf.description: Represent a page visit on a website.
Liquid Events represents the moment that something (e.g. a web page) was personalized.

id.description: Unique ID (uuid) that represents the error. Can be used for IQNOMY support purposes.

count.description: number of events during this period (might be filtered)

allOf.description: Represents a click on a web page.

PageVisitEventInput.description: A page visit on a website.
